intro.title: The New Standard
intro.text: At 32reasons, dentistry is redefined: Health, performance, and longevity begin in the mouth. As Germany's most beautiful dental practice – awarded the ZWP Design Award 2025 – the team around Dr. Kreymborg and K. Grimm combines excellent medicine with digital technology and award-winning design.

philosophy.title: The Philosophy: Systemic Health
points: True future health requires looking beyond the horizon of classical dentistry.
Sustainable vitality is based on preventive, medically sound diagnostics.
Dentistry is immediately linked to systemic health.
The goal is to create a basis for lifelong performance and health.

role.title: The Role of Polaris DX in Daily Practice
role.text: Polaris DX is an integral part of this forward-looking concept and perfectly complements the practice's high-end workflow.

points.title: Real-time Diagnostics
points.text: The Chairside-Reader enables the determination of critical biomarkers like Vitamin D and HbA1c (diabetes marker) directly in the practice.

points.title: Evidence-based Therapy
points.text: Through the immediate availability of laboratory parameters, therapy decisions can be made faster and on a sound data basis.

points.title: Patient Experience
points.text: The integration of laboratory diagnostics directly at the treatment chair underscores the claim to seamless and state-of-the-art patient care.
